ygData.subject: Re: Avoiding the Storm
ygData.msgSnippet: OOC: That s what you think, Instrat goes anywhere she has to go. (Smiles dementedly as he types) BIC: Train Wreck and Arrow touch down on Prehistoric Earth.

OOC: That's what you think, Instrat goes anywhere she has to go. (Smiles
dementedly as he types)

BIC: Train Wreck and Arrow touch down on Prehistoric Earth. The trip didn't
take as long as they thought. Instrat walked through the SWAMP right up to
the ship. (Remember, Team Ultima base was in the swamp) Near where they had
landed was the remains of the old People's/Ultima's base, and nearby it was
the ship the Radicons originally came to the planet in. Train Wreck ran up
to the ship. Arrow sees the Ultima base in ruins and laughs.

Arrow: But...I know Stronghold and Blender survived. They're just like that,
survivors.

Instrat: Who are you?

Arrow: Arrow, and Train Wreck.

Instrat: I'm Instrat.

Arrow: Yep.

Arrow aimed his tiny but deadly blaster at Instrat.

Train Wreck: Wait!

Arrow: What?

Train Wreck: What did she do?

Arrow: Nothing, that's why it's great to kill her!

Instrat looked on in fear as they argued, but quickly changed to angry mode.

Train Wreck: But she's so nice looking.

Arrow: Oh, great, now you're pulling an Airbomber!

Train Wreck: Huh?

Arrow: Never mind.

Train Wreck: Say, Instrat, would you like to hang around us?

Instrat: Is he going to try to kill me?

Train Wreck: No, not anymore.

Instrat: I thought I wouldn't have any friends, those 2 back there weren't
nice at all.

Train Wreck: Well, if we ever come across them again, we could kill them.

Instrat: Well, I don't really want them dead, I had fun with them.

Train Wreck: They sound awful to me. Like our good old friends who killed
us.

Instrat: Killed you? But...

Train Wreck: Long story.

Arrow: But when we find them again, they won't catch us off guard, they'll
pay.

Arrow thinks in his mind about how much fun it would be to kill Stronghold
and Blender, then thinks about the fun it would be to kill Instrat's 2 old
friends...(Carnage and Teltoli)
----- Original Message -----
From: "Carnage darkness" <carnage_blood@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 09, 2001 8:53 PM
Subject: Re: Avoiding the Storm


> ** Carnage watched it all, but it was a reliefe to see Instrat go...even
> though she could smell the sadness in the air when she had turned away
from
> them.
> In that case, it almost mannaged to make her feel bad...almost. But
Instrat
> had attacked them, then seemed to become friendly, then finally decided
that
> she hated her guts!
> For all she cared, a bot that couldn't understend what people had to go
> through to have friends, didn't need any friends at all. And with
Instrat's
> attetude, she didn't know if she would ever have any. But, like she had
> thought she would be alone forever, sometimes things worked out.
> Carnage continued to walk as Instrat walked away and Teltoli joined her in
> the direction of the swamps.
> She knew that what Teltoli had done wasn't really right, but where they
were
> going Instrat wouldn't like anyway.**
>
